sections.summary: i am a highly motivated and versatile digital strategist, storyteller and creative enabler.â i've built and led teams within communications and marketing agencies focusing on digital strategy, content marketing and influencer engagement. working closely with varied teams, internal and external, to devise the best audience modeling, cpg, b2c / b2b strategies, seo/sem, creative development, production cycles, digital media, applications and mobile innovation geared to drive results. https://about.me/broadbandito career goal providing strategic guidance and execution support of core digital activity for a portfolio of henkel brands. â specifically,â senior digital marketing manager - 170000nu
